attributes.background: get rid of the people only showing face to claim the attendance allowance, they are know,but nothing is being done due to scandal, name and shame now

rejection.details:
We can only accept petitions about matters that the Government or the House of Commons are responsible for. We can't accept petitions calling on the House of Lords to take action.

You can find out more about allowances for members of the House of Lords here:

http://www.parliament.uk/about/mps-and-lords/about-lords/lords-allowances/
